mean_cn: vt. 使瘫痪；使麻痹；使不能活动
mean_en: to make (a person or animal) unable to move or feel all or part of the body
word_etyma: para旁边 + lyze松散 → 身体旁边无力 → paralyze 使瘫痪，使麻痹
short_phrase: Something paralyzed her; she cannot walk.
sentence: The disease may paralyze his body, but not his thinking.
sentence_trans: 疾病可以让他的身体瘫痪，但却不能麻痹他思考的能力。
